product_name: DHCEye Bright Eye Moisturizer with Caffeine
summary: SummaryWake up tired eyes with a refreshing gel to rejuvenate the delicate undereye area. This lightweight, quick absorbing gel is infused with caffeine and botanicals that help reduce the appearance of dark circles and puffiness, giving you a more vibrant, well-rested look.
details: DetailsBenefitsCaffeine minimizes the look of puffiness and dark circlesAntioxidant-rich cucumber cools lids and undereye areaSoothes and comforts the eye area and replenishes moistureGel formula effortlessly glides on and absorbs quicklyGood for daytime and nighttime useKey IngredientsCaffeine: Reduces the look of puffiness and dark circles.Cucumber Juice: Antioxidant that cools, calms and soothes.Licorice Root Extract: Soothes skin.Sodium Hyaluronate: A derivative of hyaluronic acid, helps replenish skinâ€™s natural moisture barrier.Item 2544303How To UseAfter cleansing, apply a small amount evenly to eyelid and under-eye area. Press gently into skin with ring finger. Tip: Leave in the refrigerator for a few minutes before applying to enhance the gel's cool, soothing sensation.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Juice, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Alcohol, Carbomer, Potassium Hydroxide, Caffeine, Saccharide Isomerate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Isodonis Japonicus Leaf/Stalk Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Allantoin, Placental Protein, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply a small amount evenly to eyelid and under-eye area. Press gently into skin with ring finger. Tip: Leave in the refrigerator for a few minutes before applying to enhance the gel's cool, soothing sensation.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: This is a very light gel and I've really not noticed absolutely any difference in using it over the course of the last few months. Its moisturizing to a point, but being water based only takes it so far. Would not buy again and don't recommend

reviews.headline: Genetic Dark Circles
reviews.comments: The product is nice and gentle. Goes on smooth and soft. Doesn't irritate my sensitive skin either. However, my dark circles are still just as dark than before I put it on. I don't see the brightening effect.

reviews.headline: a must-have
reviews.comments: since implementing this in my routine, i saw drastic changes. especially in between my brows. i tend to scrunch my face when I concentrate. this has left pronounced wrinkles. since using this eye serum I've seen the lines soften. 10/10 recommend

reviews.headline: A must have in your morning Routine!!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this eye gel!! Gets rid of puffiness and lifts and firms the under eye skin. It absorbs quickly and that makes perfect for morning makeup routine.

reviews.headline: A must in your morning routine!!!
reviews.comments: I love the light gel texture of this product!! I use it in the morning to refresh my eyes, it instantly depuffs and tighten the skin.

reviews.headline: Feels great
reviews.comments:
Try it out! I've tried other cheaper alternatives but I love this brand and trust it's quality.
Feels great and def feel like my under eyes are visibly brighter and not so sulky. 

I've paired this with better sleep. It's not a miracle worker, ladies . Let's be real. Lol but it does help keep the sensitive areas around your eyes moisturized and supple.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: I've been using this for 3 weeks now and see no difference whatsoever. I am disappointed.

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: I got this to get rid of dark circles under my eyes and they have faded substantially after about a week. I use it under my eyes and on my eye lids and the whole area looks so much better. You only need a little bit so one tube goes a long way.

reviews.headline: Eh
reviews.comments: Doesn't do a whole lot for me. Works well for swollen eyes

reviews.headline: Works well!
reviews.comments: So far all DHC products have worked well for me! This eye bright reduces the puffiness under my eyes. I wear it under my makeup or at night time sometimes.

reviews.headline: No Improvement
reviews.comments: I was excited to try out this product with so many great reviews, but I am super disappointed. I've used this product for 3 months now with absolutely no improvement lately in my under eye whatsoever.

reviews.headline: Exceptional product!!
reviews.comments: I think it's fantastic that Ulta is selling DHC products. I used this gel years ago but somehow stopped receiving their magazine. This eye gel is amazing and so soothing. Totally depuffs your under eye area. So happy I found this at ulta. You will not be disappointed.

faceoff_positive.comments: I had several samples I took with me to Europe for six weeks in November through December. I wasn't getting nearly enough sleep and my eyes were soooooo tired. I had been using another brand the first week for the same reasons. Dark circles and puffiness. But it wasn't helping and it dehydrated my eyes. I swapped to this, and it made a HUGE difference under my eyes. It was hydrating and seriously took away the puffiness. I totally recommend for this!
faceoff_positive.headline: This. Was. AMAZING

faceoff_negative.comments: This was given to me as a "hand me down" type product from my mom, who highly praises DHC. Typically, I'm all for trying new skincare products, but this time, I regret using this product. The first few times I used it, it was great. After a few uses, I started to notice some slight irritation. A day after noticing this, my eyelids are on fire. Typically I wouldn't put the product on my eyelid but "all around eyes", in my opinion, means to the browbone. My eyes are irritated and burning, and there are small bumps around the eyelid. This might just be my skin reacting negatively, but I wouldn't take the chance if you hace sensitive skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Irritated Eyes

rollup.name: Eye Bright Eye Moisturizer with Caffeine
